code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt c/o 8 days h/o mild non pruritic rash, mild menorrhagia and mild easy bruising. NKDA. she is a 30 yo white f system administrator. o:Height 67 in, Weight 118 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16, Skin = pink, no pallor, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Idiopathic Thrombocytic Purpura p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed dexamethasone - 40 mg daily x 4 days, and ordered CBC.

s:30 year old white f reports mild non pruritic rash, mild easy bruising. Also complains of mild menorrhagia from time to time. o:Height 67 in, Weight 120 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 16, Skin = pink, no pallor, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Idiopathic Thrombocytic Purpura p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed prednisone - 1 mg/kg daily, and ordered CBC.
